fields.name: One month subscription
fields.description: This is a subscription for one month, you don't need to pay again for next 30 days, to have an access to our service

fields.name: Six months subscription
fields.description: This is a subscription for six months, you will need to pay again in 180 days, to keep using our service

fields.name: One year subscription
fields.description: This is a subscription for 12 months, you don't need to pay for next year, to keep using our service
